Imaging Sessions.description: Total number of different types of session visible

Projects Visibility.description: Total project visible and their visiblity type

Sessions types/Project.description: Number of sessions types for each visible project

Subjects/Project.description: Number of Subjects or patient in each visible project

Age Range.description: Age distribution of patients or subjects

Handedness.description: Number of patients with their dominant hand count

Experiments/Subject.description: Number of sessions for each patient

Experiments/Project.description: Number of sessions for each project visible

Scans Quality.description: How many scans are of usable quality

Scan Types.description: Different scan types present and there count

Scans/Project.description: Number of scans present in each project

Scans/Subject.description: Number of scans for each patient

Resources/Project.description: Number of resources present in each project

Resource Types.description: Different type of resources present. No data field represent session don't have any resource object.

Resources/Session.description: Number of resources present for each session

UsableT1.description: Number of usable and non usable T1 for each session done on patient

Archiving Validator.description: Number of session which have archiving validato

Version Distribution.description: Different versions of Archiving validator for each sessions

BBRC validator.description: BBRC validator present in resources for each session

Sessions/Resource type.description: Click on one of the resource types, corresponding sessions which have the resource type will be shown

Consistent Acquisition Date.description: Whether acqisition date field is present in resources. No data means acquistion date for session isn't present

Dates Diff.description: Difference between insertion dates and acquisition dates per session, if acqusition date present in session test

Projects.description: Number of projects over time saved in XNAT instance.

Subjects.description: Number of subjects over time saved in XNAT instance.

Experiments.description: Number of experiments over time saved in XNAT instance.

Scans.description: Number of scans over time saved in XNAT instance.

Resources.description: Number of resources over time saved in XNAT instance.

Free Surfer.description: Shows whether free surfer resource details exist or not.

Freesurfer end and start hour difference.description: Difference between the freesurfer start and end time in hours.

Experiments Proportions.description: Number of experiments that each subject have.

Scans Proportions.description: Number of scans that each subject have.

Session resource count/Project.description: Number of scans that each subject have.
